original_title: Woman killed, child injured in shooting in Marawila
original_body_lines: A 30-year-old woman is reported dead while a 10-year-old boy has been injured following a shooting incident at Maranda in Marawila, police said.
Police said that an unidentified gunman had opened fire at a woman who was in front of a residence in Maranda and that a small boy who was nearby was also injured in the shooting.
